name: UpdateApplication
description:
Update an application status or details.

Use this tool to update the details of an application. Useful for modifying application statuses or details. Requires 'candidatesWrite' permission.

parameters.name: application_update_details
parameters.description: JSON object containing applicationId, sourceId, creditedToUserId, createdAt, and sendNotifications. This data is used to update application details. Ensure to specify sendNotifications to true or false based on notification preference.

sendNotifications.description: Whether or not users who are subscribed to the application should be notified that application was updated. Default is true.
